# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the app is hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHidden: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the app is hidden or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it is not.

## Hiding Windows

- **hide(_:)**: Hides all the receiver’s windows, and the next app in line is activated.
- **unhide(_:)**: Restores hidden windows to the screen and makes the receiver active.
- **unhideWithoutActivation()**: Restores hidden windows without activating their owner (the receiver).
